senses.sense_definition: A city and the county seat of Arad County in the Transylvania region of western Romania.

examples.text: We took a train to <w>Arad</w> to admire its historic architecture.
The city of <w>Arad</w> serves as an important transportation hub near the border.

senses.sense_definition: A city located in the Southern District of Israel.

examples.text: Many tourists stay in <w>Arad</w> because of its proximity to the Dead Sea.
The dry climate of <w>Arad</w> is considered beneficial for people with respiratory issues.

senses.sense_definition: A county located in the western part of Romania.

examples.text: The geography of <w>Arad</w> includes both fertile plains and rolling hills.
Several vineyards in <w>Arad</w> produce excellent local wines.

senses.sense_definition: A city in Fars Province, Iran.

examples.text: He traveled to the small town of <w>Arad</w> to visit his relatives.
The map indicates that <w>Arad</w> is located in the southern part of the province.
The <w>arad</w> guided his flock across the dry plains in search of water.
Living as an <w>arad</w> requires resilience and deep knowledge of the land.
